blocks.name: cbc
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the binomial coefficient operation (combinatorial choose operation).
blocks.origin: const class cbc { _C }

blocks.name: diff.cbc.s
diff.cbc.c
diff.cbc.w
df-bc
blocks.content: Define the binomial coefficient operation. For example, ` ( 5 _C 3 ) = 1 0 ` ( ~ ex-bc ). In the literature, this function is often written as a column vector of the two arguments, or with the arguments as subscripts before and after the letter "C". The expression ` ( N _C K ) ` is read " ` N ` choose ` K ` ". Definition of binomial coefficient in [Gleason] p. 295. As suggested by Gleason, we define it to be 0 when ` 0 <_ k <_ n ` does not hold. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jul-2005.)

blocks.name: bcval
blocks.content: Value of the binomial coefficient, ` N ` choose ` K ` . Definition of binomial coefficient in [Gleason] p. 295. As suggested by Gleason, we define it to be 0 when ` 0 <_ K <_ N ` does not hold. See ~ bcval2 for the value in the standard domain. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jul-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm bcval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cbc, c1), cif(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), nat0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))))
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, cz, cbc, cif(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), nat0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), cif(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)))), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs0)))), cif(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)))), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  ifbieq1d(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)))), nat0, co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cfz, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, nat0, cfz)
  oveq12d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), cfv(cfa, c0), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cfa)
  oveq1d(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfa, cmin, cv(hs1))
  ifbieq1d(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)))), nat0, co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))
  oveq2d(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq12d(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cfa, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2d(cfa, co(c0, cmin, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmin, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0, cmin)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cfa)
  df-bc(hs0, hs1)
  ifex(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), nat0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  ovex(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)))
  c0ex()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), nat0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cif(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), nat0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))))

  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))
  mpbid(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  elfzle1(c1, nat0, c0)
  sylancr(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  0re()
  lenlt(nat0, c1)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  elfzle2(c1, nat0, c0)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  zred(c1, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, c1), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0))), crp), wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0)), cn))
  faccld(c1, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  elfz3nn0(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0))
  fznn0sub(c0, nat0, c1)
  elfznn0(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0)), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, c0), cn))
  faccl(co(c1, cmin, c0))
  faccl(c0)
  nnmulcl(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cfv(cfa, c0))
  syl2an(wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0)), cn), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, c1), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0))), crp), wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), crp), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c0)), crp))

blocks.name: bccmpl
blocks.content: "Complementing" its second argument doesn't change a binary coefficient. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Mar-2014.)

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cbc, c1), co(c0, cbc, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbc, c1), co(c0, cbc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  bcval2(c1, c0)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)))), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cbc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1))))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  bcval2(co(c0, cmin, c1), c0)
  oveq2d(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1))), co(cfv(cfa, c1), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  mulcomd(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cfa, c1), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  fznn0sub2(c1, c0)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  faccld(co(c0, cmin, c1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  elfznn0(co(c0, cmin, c1), c0)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, c1), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  faccld(c1, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  elfznn0(c1, c0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1))), cmul, cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cfa, c1), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  fveq2d(cfa, co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), c1, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), c1), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))
  elfz3nn0(c1, c0)
  elfzelz(c1, nat0, c0)

  eqtr4d(co(c0, cbc, c1), co(c0, cbc, co(c0, cmin, c1)), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)))))

  simp1(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))))

  sylan(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  zsubcl(c0, c1)
  3impia(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0))), wn(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  con3d(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  fznn0sub2(co(c0, cmin, c1), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, cfz, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, cmin, co(c0, cmin, c1)), c1), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  nn0cn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  nncan(c0, c1)
  bcval3(c0, co(c0, cmin, c1))
